Name: GlobalSegmentGravity
Notes: A gravity area that pulls objects in its range towards the lateral surface and base surfaces of a cylinder.

Obj_arg0.Name: Enabled Bases
Obj_arg0.Description: What bases should affect gravity. By default, both bases are enabled.

Obj_arg1.Name: Valid Degrees
Obj_arg1.Description: The radial degrees that will have gravity. Starts pointing towards X+ and then rotates counterclockwise around the Y axis. Default is 360.

SW_A.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
